## Journal articles

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| message: false
#| eval: false
# this section is run manually to obtain
# publication list 
library(rorcid)
library(dplyr)
#add your ORCID ID here
b <- works("0000-0002-8623-8639")
pubs <- data.frame(title = b$title.title.value, 
               year = b$`publication-date.year.value`,
               journal = b$`journal-title.value`,
               doi = b$url.value) |>
  arrange(desc(year)) |>
  mutate(
    titlelink = glue::glue("[{title}]({doi})"),
    title_for_matching = tolower(title) |> stringr::str_remove_all(fixed("<i>")) |> 
      stringr::str_remove_all(fixed("</i>")) |> stringr::str_replace_all("â€", "-"),
    journal = journal |> str_remove("^The ")
    ) |>
  distinct(title_for_matching, year, journal, .keep_all = TRUE) |> 
  filter(!is.na(journal))
pubs |> saveRDS("pubs.rds")
```

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| message: false
#| warning: false
library(dplyr)
library(gt)
library(stringr)
pubs <- readRDS("pubs.rds")
pubs |> 
  select(titlelink, year, journal) |>
  gt() |>
  gt::fmt_markdown(columns = titlelink) |>
  cols_label(titlelink = "title") |> 
  gt::cols_width(titlelink ~ px(500),
                 year ~ px(50),
                 journal ~ px(200)) |>
  cols_align("left")

```
